name: Russian Keyboard
description:
A simple local multiplayer game made in an hour.

-Press a random letter in the keyboard.
-If you're REALLY sure, press Space to confirm that key.
-If it turns green, it's next player's turn (or you can, like me, play alone).
-You'll know when you lose. Press Enter to play again.

Credits to Wassim Awadallah (Twitter) for the gorgeous Less Sans font!

Grabbed the idea from a list I wrote about two years ago of "stupid ideas I'll never develop". In your face, two-years-ago Martin.
